name: Spirit Shackle
description: You employ dark energy to stitch a creature’s shadow to the ground.  Make a ranged attack, dealing 2d6 + MOVE ghost damage on a hit.  On hit, the target is unable to flee or switch out while the user remains in battle.
higherLevels: The damage dice roll for this move changes to 2d8 at level 5, 4d6 at level 10, and 6d6 at level 17.
